content:
EXISTING STRUCTURES
--------------------
### Iron Smelting Furnace at Position (5.0, 5.0)
Used for converting iron ore into iron plates.
Consists of:
– Furnace located at (5.0, 5.0)

### Copper Smelting Furnace at Position (–27.0, –60.0)
Used for converting copper ore into copper plates.
Consists of:
– Furnace located at (–27.0, –60.0)

ERROR TIPS
----------
• API Call Consistency:
  – When invoking get_entities, ensure that all arguments match the function’s defined signature. Avoid using unexpected keyword arguments (for example, do not pass “radius” if only positional arguments are accepted).

• Lab Placement and Retrieval:
  – Before attempting to place a Lab, verify that the required Lab item is present in the inventory.
  – When processing the result from get_entities, check that it is not None (or use an empty list as fallback) to prevent iteration errors.

• Lab Crafting and Resource Management:
  – Confirm that all sub-ingredients needed for Lab crafting are available, and that the associated production chains (e.g. for iron-gear-wheels, electronic-circuits, and copper-cables) are properly supported by available smelting or crafting facilities.
  – Reassess resource availability before reattempting Lab crafting to avoid missing ingredient errors.
